eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Archuleta, CO; AT 12:51 PM ON OCT 13, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:51 PM OCT 14, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: The Archuleta County Sheriff's Office Emergency Management is issuing a Flood Warning for Archuleta County until 10/15/25 at 3:00pm. The rivers are rising and could affect property and structures.  Be aware of your surroundings and rock and mud slides.  A weather warning indicates a confirmed, current and present danger to this area. Take necessary safety precautions.  All low lying areas near rivers and water courses are in a pre evacuation status.  Follow Archuleta County Sheriff's Office Facebook page for regular updates.
